newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index ends session 0.12 pct higher.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index ends session 0.12 pct higher.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Wednesday closed up by 0.12 percent in higher trade, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 519.47 from 518.83 on Tuesday.

Total volume was 3.41 million dinars against 1.49 million dinars at the previous session. Over-the-counter exchanges amounted to 2.7 million dinars and the turnover on the first market 651,603 dinars.
Industries Chimiques du Fluor gained 1.5 dinars to 52.06. Chemical firm Al-Kimia gained 0.5 dinar to 45.5.
Banque de l'Habitat was up 0.22 dinar to 20.32 dinars. BIAT rose 0.18 dinar to 36.2.
Detergents firm SPCD was down 0.92 dinar to 34.5 dinars. Banque de Tunisie slid 0.5 dinar to 74.5. ATB bank eased 0.14 dinar to 34 dinars.
